mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_badge(badge_id, user_id, badge_name, badge_image_url, created_at, public_yn) VALUES(#{badgeId}, #{userId}, #{badgeName}, #{badgeImageUrl}, now(), #{publicYn})
mapper.select: SELECT badge_id as badgeId, user_id as userId, badge_name as badgeName, badge_image_url as badgeImageUrl, public_yn as publicYn, created_at as createdAt FROM user_badge WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND public_yn = 'Y'
